title: "Hackers can read private AI assistant chats even though they’re encrypted"
excerpt: "Enlarge / Attack overview: A packet capture of an AI assistant’s real-time response reveals a token-sequence side-channel. The side-channel is parsed to find text segments which are then reconstructed using sentence-level context and knowledge of the target LLM’s writing style."
